channel.title: 667 white portal
channel.description: How can i make a pvp area and the white and red portal let me teleport? Thanks already,

item.title: 667 white portal
item.dc:creator: @WretchBack WretchBack
item.description:
@WretchBack wrote:

[quote=“Teeky_Pk, post:3, topic:442972”][quote author=alex-futureX link=topic=545662.msg3999688#msg3999688 date=1337790467]
Add a teleport to each object, the red portal and white portal. In ObjectHandler.java: \src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers
Google the white portal and red portal object id. I don’t know them. You also need to find the coords of were you want the portals to teleport you to.

Then add these codes.

else if (id == white portal object id code) { Magic.sendNormalTeleportSpell(player, 0, 0, new WorldTile(inside white portal coords)); } else if (id == red portal object id code) { Magic.sendNormalTeleportSpell(player, 0, 0, new WorldTile(inside red portal coords));

To make the area multi go to world.java: \src\com\rs\game
find: public static final boolean isMultiArea(WorldTile tile)
under that add: || (destX >=**** && destX <= **** && destY >= **** && destY <= ****)
change the ****'s to the areas coords.

To make the area PvP go to world.java: \src\com\rs\game
find: public static final boolean isPvpArea(WorldTile tile)
under that add: int destX = tile.getX(); int destY = tile.getY();

and also add under: public static final boolean isPvpArea(WorldTile tile)

once again change **** to the areas coords.

Your Welcome: If you need any help, pm or add me on skype: alexjohnson007
[/quote]

Lol, you forgot to make the SafePortal.java controler start… so it won’t work.[/quote] Can you help me make a SafePortal.java controler?

Read full topic

item.title: 667 white portal
item.dc:creator: @Teeky_Pk Teeky_Pk
item.description:
@Teeky_Pk wrote:

[quote=“alex-futureX, post:2, topic:442972”]Add a teleport to each object, the red portal and white portal. In ObjectHandler.java: \src\com\rs\net\decoders\handlers
Google the white portal and red portal object id. I don’t know them. You also need to find the coords of were you want the portals to teleport you to.

Then add these codes.

else if (id == white portal object id code) { Magic.sendNormalTeleportSpell(player, 0, 0, new WorldTile(inside white portal coords)); } else if (id == red portal object id code) { Magic.sendNormalTeleportSpell(player, 0, 0, new WorldTile(inside red portal coords));

To make the area multi go to world.java: \src\com\rs\game
find: public static final boolean isMultiArea(WorldTile tile)
under that add: || (destX >=**** && destX <= **** && destY >= **** && destY <= ****)
change the ****'s to the areas coords.

To make the area PvP go to world.java: \src\com\rs\game
find: public static final boolean isPvpArea(WorldTile tile)
under that add: int destX = tile.getX(); int destY = tile.getY();

and also add under: public static final boolean isPvpArea(WorldTile tile)

once again change **** to the areas coords.

Your Welcome: If you need any help, pm or add me on skype: alexjohnson007[/quote]

Lol, you forgot to make the SafePortal.java controler start… so it won’t work.

Read full topic
